list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a sticky yellowish moldable substance secreted by honeybees as the material of honeycomb; beeswax.
cover or treat (something) with wax or a similar substance, typically to polish or protect it.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: I washed and waxed the floor
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tôi rửa và sáp lên sàn

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he waxed a series of tracks that emphasized his lead guitar work
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: anh ta đã tẩy lông một loạt các bài hát nhấn mạnh công việc guitar chì của mình

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (of the moon between new and full) have a progressively larger part of its visible surface illuminated, increasing its apparent size.
